snippet.title: Sonic - Project Hero - 2019 Demo! (In celebration of SAGE 2019)
snippet.description:
This is it. After half a year's worth of anxious waiting, silence and burnouts, I've finally gathered myself back to this project at full force. And what better way to make a return than giving people a taste of what's been done, and just in time to wrap up this year's Sonic Amateur Games Expo?

-----DEMO----

The first ever public demo of Sonic - Project Hero is out NOW!
Get it here:
https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-project-hero-2019-demo-out-now.400/

---EXTRA---
Want to learn more about the Sonic Amateur Games Expo (SAGE)? Check out this video by Expansion Pack!
https://youtu.be/vFIW8D96Ftc


----DISCORD SERVER----
~~ UPDATE SEP. 2023 ~~
The server has been archived. The link should be here for a while so you can check it out if you want to.
https://discord.gg/5VsaMAz79

----CREDITS----
HUGE thanks to:
-minty cups
-D the Hedgehog
-「 D E R K 」
-sapphicSpadassin 
-(Real)Cypher123
-Goalringmod27
-AzureBurst
-Ryboflavin
-Sir Giygas
-WizGenesis
-piggehperson
-Rishy
-Burst
-Geki
-spoon Scribble
-Not So Greedy
and more!

Music used in this video:
Splash Wave - Outrun 2006 - Coast 2 Coast OST.

Tags:
#Sonic #SonicTheHedgehog #Fangame
